card_values.Active Cash: $200 cash reward bonus when you spend $500 in purchases in the first 3 months
card_values.Autograph: Earn 20,000 bonus points when you spend $1,000 in purchases in the first 3 months
card_values.Autograph Journey: Earn 60,000 bonus points when you spend $4,000 in purchases in the first 3 months

card_values.Active Cash: Earn unlimited 2% cash rewards on purchases
card_values.Autograph: 3X points on restaurants, travel, gas stations, transit, popular streaming services, and phone plans. 1X points on other purchases
card_values.Autograph Journey: 5X points on hotels, 4X points on airlines, 3X points on restaurants and other travel, 1X points on other purchases

card_values.Active Cash: 0% intro APR for 12 months from account opening on purchases and qualifying balance transfers. After that, variable APR of 18.74%, 24.74% or 28.74%
card_values.Autograph: 0% intro APR for 12 months from account opening on purchases and qualifying balance transfers. After that, variable APR of 20.24%, 25.24%, or 29.99%
card_values.Autograph Journey: No intro APR offer - standard variable APR applies

card_values.Active Cash: Simple cash back on all purchases without categories to track
card_values.Autograph: Maximize rewards on everyday spending categories like dining, travel, and streaming
card_values.Autograph Journey: Frequent travelers who want premium travel rewards and are willing to pay an annual fee

card_values.Active Cash: Up to $600 protection against covered damage or theft (subject to $25 deductible)
card_values.Autograph: Up to $600 protection against covered damage or theft (subject to $25 deductible)
card_values.Autograph Journey: Up to $600 protection against covered damage or theft (subject to $25 deductible)
